name: Nelda Ekstrom
text: This was the dirtiest Pizza Hut I have ever been in. The walls were unfinished. One of the few tables was full of boxes. The napkin dispenser was empty. The table that we sat at was sticky. The restroom was disgusting. The cashier was …More

name: ghulam khan
text: we bought a pizza we would accept it to be fresh but, it wasn't the topping weren't fresh at all. So I talked to the worker and he said that the company sends me the topping and I just use them and also Piza smell like really bad please check pizza before eat

name: Keri Saunders
text: My order was correct and ready for pickup not even 15 minutes after I ordered online. Friendly service.

name: Kim V
text: Very dirty, only one girl cooking, cashiering, and taking orders. Not a large selection, but the pizza was made fresh. There's hardly any seating and there's one refrigerator with only 2 liters of pop. When asked, the woman stated that they …More

name: Ann Feagin
text: I really appreciate it and I enjoyed the food always pray before we eat AMEN and Again Amen!!!

name: Sunil Kalmala
text: checked in mins ago, everything was so fresh & delicious. Kudos to the staff for the friendly service, God bless you.

name: Cherie Carter
text: Went there tonight July 15th about 745 pm. Staff was amazing. A young man waited on us and was very very pleasent. Restraunt work is tough I know I work fast food. He was very upbeat and our pizza was delicious. Thank you Dansville Pizza Hut great job

name: U62 YT
text: I miss the gumball machine that was filled with bouncy balls. I remember collecting them as a kid.

name: Dharmesh Shah
text: U Know nobody beats Pizza the Hutt

name: Rachel Etherton
text: Pizza was really dry and not very flavorful. Plus were out of some toppings

name: Adam Zuber
text: Small Pizza Hut, not that clean, not much selection.

name: Trisha Cox
text: Wrong toppings on the pizza and rock hard cold bread sticks.
